text: The 2007 IAAF World Road Running Championships were held in Udine, Italy on 14 October 2007. Detailed reports on the event and an appraisal of the results were given both for the men's race and for the women's race. ==Medallists== {| |- |colspan=7 bgcolor=#eeeeee style=text-align:center;| Individual |- |Men | || 58:59 | || 59:02 | || 59:05 |- |Women | || 1:06:25 | || 1:06:48 | || 1:08:06 |- |colspan=7 bgcolor=#eeeeee style=text-align:center;| Team |- |Team Men | || 2:58:54 | || 2:59:08 | || 3:01:15 |- |Team Women | || 3:23:33 | || 3:25:51 | || 3:27:39 |} ==Race results== Complete results were published for the men's race, for the women's race, for men's team, and for women's team. ===Men's=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center; font- size:95%;" width="50%" !
